content: free version on my blog http //julieyeagerdesigns com i was thinking about how pretty and easy this block is and i was trying to think of a name and i was thinking about the county fairs at this time of the year and i came up with sweet and fair straightforward instructions for treble clusters and for treble crocheting four stitches together as well as a few front-post stitches part of the nuts about squares cal round by round video by esther djikstra here https //www youtube com/watch v=yhzzuv9xub0 pattern support on my rav board julie yeager designs group 1 thanks for your interest in my patterns see them all in my ravelry store 2 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/julie-yeager-designs 2 http //www ravelry com/stores/julie-yeager-designs
